name: Rephy
subtitle: Spiritual Guide
description: Half-human and half-animal, this creature guides souls using a spirit lamp. Heals allies with the power of souls. Disturbs enemies or recovers Mana of allies with the help of souls as well.
story: This pure and kindhearted Tamian soul guide can communicate with the dead. The Tamian race lives in harmony with nature, and they have the ability to read its flow and guide the souls of the dead. Rephy's ability as a soul guide is exceptional, even for a Tamian. He uses it to guide the souls of those who died in the forest and help them pass on, preventing them from turning evil. He is the most capable among the Tamians in discerning the paths of the stars, pacifying the souls of the dead, and properly guiding them to the afterlife.

inn.idle: Have you heard of the Tamian tribe?

recruit.greet: I'm Rephy, sage of the Tamian tribe.
talk: Human, come with me. Let's go, defeat the evil king and protect the forest.
You never get lost in this forest with me!
It is one of our tasks to guide those who died in the forest, helping them return to where they must..
recruit.gift: I got a gift from a human! Hooray!

affinity.greet: It's warm! The souls will like this place!
talk: Can you hear that? The stars outside the window are whispering to us!
Human, I'll invite you to our forest next time!
affinity.gift: A surprise gift? Humans really are good friends!

relationship.greet: Hi! Your soul is as pure as usual!
talk: The forest feels good! Clear air, refreshing winds, dancing fairies...
Leave the guiding to me! The souls will help us!
The stars say, today will be a good day! Let's go out!

uw.story: It is the duty of a soul guide to lead the lost souls onto the right path, to help them move on to the next life. This lamp, powered by a mysterious orb created long ago by a dragon from a distant land, is a treasure of the Tamians. The orb at its core allows nearby souls to materialize, making it possible for its wielder to talk to them directly. As such, it is the ultimate medium for a soul guide. Tamian chieftains have used this relic to carry out the sacred duties of a soul guide for generations. Now, in the face a great danger that threatens the world, the lamp has been passed on to Rephy, the most powerful soul guide in existence.
